item.description:
Take some time this summer to Beat the Heat. For children, summer is a chance to be free & to grow. As adults we don't get summers off. I challenge you to stop what you are doing for a few hours and come play with glue, images & your intuition. It is my hope that you will find your freedom & grow from what you have learned.

Soul Collage® is a process that is best described as a creative practice, much like journaling. You can explore and express your deepest self with it. It is a practice that is often a path to deep, inner healing, and sometimes to transformation. It is very intuitive & creative.

I have the unique pleasure of collecting images from magazines dated 1970-1980s! Come see the amazing images!

This workshop is perfect for anyone! No artistic experience necessary. All materials included. Light lunch provided including popsicles.

Cost includes facility rental, all supplies, amazing images & lunch. A great investment in yourself! I have advertised this other places, we have 4 more people that RSVP'd.

See some examples of cards I've made & sign up for the newsletter at my website.

group.name: Above and Beyond Boston SoulCollage Meetup

item.name: Beat the Heat with SoulCollage®
